text: Sidaas baan u soo kicinnay si ay bal isu weydiiyaan dhexdooda. Midkood hadlay baa yidhi: Immisa baad joogteen (halkan)? Waxay yidhaahdeen: Waxaan joognay maalin ama maalin galinkeed. (kuwo kale) waxay yidhaahdeen: Rabbigiin baa dhab u ogsoon inta aad joogteen. Ee haatan ula dira midkiin lacagtani fiddada ah aad leedihiin xagga magaalada, oo ha fiiriyo meesha ugu cunto daahirsan, oo ha idiinka keeno risiq ka mid ah, oo ha u dhaqmo si feejignaan leh, oo yey cidina idin ogaan
